y.view
Class ViewControl

java.lang.Object
  y.view.ViewControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewChangeListener
public class ViewControl
extends Object
implements ViewChangeListener

This class manages the ViewModes on a collection of views. There is always one active View. There is one active Mode for this active View. If a the active View is changed, then the active ViewMode Is transferred to this view.

The active Mode can be changed in two ways:

  • Setting a new Mode
  • Pushing a new Mode

Parameters:
viewMode - a view mode which replaces the current active mode.
